item.description:
Hello Everyone,

Thank you for your responses. We will be meeting at The Sherborn Inn at 7pm on Friday June 9th. The reservation is under my name, I look forward to seeing you all there.

Thank you so much,

Olive McMeel

omcmeel07@comcast.net

Each will pay his/her own way.

The Sherborn Inn is located on Routes 27 and 16 in Sherborn center.
Please feel free to call me on my mobile should you get lost.

508. 367 8093 Olive mobile.

group.name: The Boston Area Young Widow and Widowers Group

item.name: PHASE 11 - Social Gathering
